sections.MISSION: Dakota Troop provides dedicated and area support to War Eagle Squadron from 24-28APR IOT conduct PLT LFX’s and exercise logistic support assets.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Provide timely, uninterrupted resupplies to all maneuver troops. Forecast commodity needs before the need is physically required
Maintain– garrison maintenance will ensure over 90% OR rate Remain Mobile and Flexible to provide emergency resupply’s of all classes of supply
Endstate:
All maneuver troops are sustained throughout training.
Concept of Support:
Dakota FST supports 1/2CR via supply point distribution and unit distribution methods. Through a hybrid garrison-forward posture, Dakota elements operate a decentralized

sections.SUSTAINMENT:
concept, leveraging organic maneuver Troop trains.
Commodity Overview
CL I: A-M-A Ration Cycle. Headcount: 400 PAX. Rifle troop trains are responsible for P/U and T/I of mermites. P/U @ 0530 and 1820 at the Warrior Restaurant CL III: -JP8:125x fuel cans are staged at RG 201 for available use. All fuel cans will be refilled every 48hrs. via distro PLT during range downtimes. -DF2: Contracted life support is topped off every 48hrs during range downtimes. CL V: Est ASP draw date: 21APR; Est ASP T/I date: 02MAY; COA1: DARAD Approved: All CLV is distro’d to RG 201 NLT 23APR and stored, guarded and accounted for by host Troop. COA2: NO GO OSM: CLV is dropped and P/U daily during range downtimes (0500-0800, 1800-2100). Storage site is TBD. AHA Guard dates req’d: 21APR-02MAY (2x armed guards)
CLIX and Maint SPT: 1x Wrecker, 1x Contact Truck on site at Range 201. Contact team will consist of 1 x 91F and 1 x 91S. Wrecker team will consist of 1 x H8 and 1 x 91S. MCRS remains on STBY at RB. GD support is coordinated for STBY SPT. Recovery PACE: P:Self, A:Like, C:Dedicated, E: MCRS
